system.description: When you attempt to worm your way into a restricted location by manipulating an underling or guard, roll with your Status in their Circle.

miss.label: Miss
miss.value: On a miss, they stand strong...but inadvertently give you an opening to gain the access you seek through violence.

weak-hit.label: Weak Hit
weak-hit.value: On a hit, they open the way for you, despite their misgivings.

strong-hit.label: Strong Hit
strong-hit.value:
On a hit, they open the way for you, despite their misgivings.

On a 10+, they promise to try to keep your name out of any trouble that arises as a result.
